<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">                      ? DecisionParams.BitmapIdx &#42; CHAR&#95;BIT + TV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coverage/mcdcrecord/testvector/#a2635eb18be1bc5306d514cd0de368598">getIndex</a>()</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Copy the completed test vector to the vector of testvectors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The final value (T,F) is equal to the last non-dontcare state on the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// path (in a short-circuiting system).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">      ExecVectorsByCond&#91;MCDCCond&#93;.push&#95;back(&#123;TV, MCDCCond&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">    TV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coverage/mcdcrecord/testvector/#abd19c8408dac3fe64ae2a37c37d643ae">set</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/mcdcrecord/#abfea249cd51ba9478b1e85bbc3508418a174b6fce191ea66ffb1e674418d159f1">MCDCRecord::MCDC&#95;DontCare</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Walk the bits in the bitmap.  A bit set to &#39;1&#39; indicates that the test</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// vector at the corresponding index was executed during a test run.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> findExecutedTestVectors() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Walk the binary decision diagram to enumerate all possible test vectors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We start at the root node (ID == 0) with all values being DontCare.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#96;TVIdx&#96; starts with 0 and is in the traversal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#96;Index&#96; encodes the bitmask of true values and is initially 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">    MCDCRecord::TestVector TV(NumConditions);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">    buildTestVector(TV, 0, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TVIdxs.size() == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(NumTestVectors) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;TVIdxs wasn&#39;t fulfilled&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fill ExecVectors order by False items and True items.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ExecVectors is the alias of ExecVectorsByCond&#91;false&#93;, so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Append ExecVectorsByCond&#91;true&#93; on it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;ExecVectorsT = ExecVectorsByCond&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">    ExecVectors.append(std::make&#95;move&#95;iterator(ExecVectorsT.begin()),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">                       std::make&#95;move&#95;iterator(ExecVectorsT.end()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Process the MC/DC Record in order to produce a result for a boolean</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// expression. This process includes tracking the conditions that comprise</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the decision region, calculating the list of all possible test vectors,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// marking the executed test vectors, and then finding an Independence Pair</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// out of the executed test vectors for each condition in the boolean</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// expression. A condition is tracked to ensure that its ID can be mapped to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// its ordinal position in the boolean expression. The condition&#39;s source</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// location is also tracked, as well as whether it is constant folded (in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// which case it is excuded from the metric).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-coveragemapping-cpp-/mcdcrecordprocessor/#adbbbd2393a335a673e48fc85db8471f3"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/mcdcrecord">MCDCRecord</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-coveragemapping-cpp-/mcdcrecordprocessor/#adbbbd2393a335a673e48fc85db8471f3">processMCDCRecord</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/mcdcrecord/#aa673020429a0011959354e2b60fe75d6">MCDCRecord::CondIDMap</a> PosToID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/mcdcrecord/#aa83254d71f109cbacac8c1ec3451333f">MCDCRecord::LineColPairMap</a> CondLoc;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Walk the Record&#39;s BranchRegions (representing Conditions) in order to:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Hash the condition based on its corresponding ID. This will be used to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   calculate the test vectors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Keep a map of the condition&#39;s ordinal position (1, 2, 3, 4) to its</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   actual ID.  This will be used to visualize the conditions in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   correct order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Keep track of the condition source location. This will be used to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   visualize where the condition is.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Record whether the condition is constant folded so that we exclude it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   from being measured.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Branches)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;BranchParams = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;getBranchParams();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">      PosToID&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = BranchParams.ID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">      CondLoc&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;startLoc();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">      Folded&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;FalseCount.isZero();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal">      Folded&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;Count.isZero();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Add MCDCBranchRegion to DecisionRecord.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Seek each Decision and apply Region to it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DecisionIter = Decisions.begin(), DecisionEnd = Decisions.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><Highlight kind="normal">         DecisionIter != DecisionEnd; ++DecisionIter)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DecisionIter-&gt;addBranch(Branch)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DecisionRecord::NotProcessed:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Distributes functions into instantiation sets.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::stable&#95;sort(CompletedRegionsIt, ActiveRegions.end(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &#91;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countedregion">CountedRegion</a> &#42;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countedregion">CountedRegion</a> &#42;R) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a> || CompletedRegion-&gt;endLoc() &lt;= &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> J = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1; J &lt; E; ++J)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><Highlight kind="normal">      startSegment(&#42;CompletedRegion, CompletedSegmentLoc, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> = ActiveRegions.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FirstCompletedRegion &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;endLoc() != &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there&#39;s a gap after the end of the last completed region and the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// start of the new region, use the last active region to fill the gap.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><Highlight kind="normal">      startSegment(&#42;ActiveRegions&#91;FirstCompletedRegion - 1&#93;, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;endLoc(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><Highlight kind="normal">                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!FirstCompletedRegion &amp;&amp; (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a> || &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;endLoc())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit a skipped segment if there are no more active regions. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ensures that gaps between functions are marked correctly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><Highlight kind="normal">      startSegment(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;endLoc(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pop the completed regions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><Highlight kind="normal">    ActiveRegions.erase(CompletedRegionsIt, ActiveRegions.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> buildSegmentsImpl(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;CountedRegion&gt;</a> Regions) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;CR : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Regions)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurStartLoc = CR.value().startLoc();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Active regions which end before the current region need to be popped.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CompletedRegions =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><Highlight kind="normal">          std::stable&#95;partition(ActiveRegions.begin(), ActiveRegions.end(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><Highlight kind="normal">                                &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countedregion">CountedRegion</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  return !(Region-&gt;endLoc() &lt;= CurStartLoc);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><Highlight kind="normal">                                &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CompletedRegions != ActiveRegions.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstCompletedRegion =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><Highlight kind="normal">            std::distance(ActiveRegions.begin(), CompletedRegions);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><Highlight kind="normal">        completeRegionsUntil(CurStartLoc, FirstCompletedRegion);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GapRegion = CR.value().Kind == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493ac031257b3294c6d8ae4afab2dd9e6edf">CounterMappingRegion::GapRegion</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to emit a segment for the current region.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurStartLoc == CR.value().endLoc()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Avoid making zero-length regions active. If it&#39;s the last region,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// emit a skipped segment. Otherwise use its predecessor&#39;s count.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Skipped =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><Highlight kind="normal">            (CR.index() + 1) == Regions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><Highlight kind="normal">            CR.value().Kind == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493abbe924008d232ccec58896a8d143db42">CounterMappingRegion::SkippedRegion</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><Highlight kind="normal">        startSegment(ActiveRegions.empty() ? CR.value() : &#42;ActiveRegions.back(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><Highlight kind="normal">                     CurStartLoc, !GapRegion, Skipped);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If it is skipped segment, create a segment with last pushed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// regions&#39;s count at CurStartLoc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Skipped &amp;&amp; !ActiveRegions.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><Highlight kind="normal">          startSegment(&#42;ActiveRegions.back(), CurStartLoc, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CR.index() + 1 == Regions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><Highlight kind="normal">          CurStartLoc != Regions&#91;CR.index() + 1&#93;.startLoc()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit a segment if the next region doesn&#39;t start at the same location</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as this one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><Highlight kind="normal">        startSegment(CR.value(), CurStartLoc, !GapRegion);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This region is active (i.e not completed).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><Highlight kind="normal">      ActiveRegions.push&#95;back(&amp;CR.value());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Complete any remaining active regions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ActiveRegions.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><Highlight kind="normal">      completeRegionsUntil(std::nullopt, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Sort a nested sequence of regions from a single file.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> sortNestedRegions(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;CountedRegion&gt;</a> Regions) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74cdbd1e4f731e7d7cd83461b8b1de0b">llvm::sort</a>(Regions, &#91;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countedregion">CountedRegion</a> &amp;LHS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countedregion">CountedRegion</a> &amp;RHS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1280"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.startLoc() != RHS.startLoc())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1281"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LHS.startLoc() &lt; RHS.startLoc();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1282"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.endLoc() != RHS.endLoc())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1283"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When LHS completely contains RHS, we sort LHS first.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1284"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RHS.endLoc() &lt; LHS.endLoc();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If LHS and RHS cover the same area, we need to sort them according</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to their kinds so that the most suitable region will become &quot;active&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in combineRegions(). Because we accumulate counter values only from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// regions of the same kind as the first region of the area, prefer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CodeRegion to ExpansionRegion and ExpansionRegion to SkippedRegion.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493ad1c0402f0bac0395dcc0cd8b0a5c43d4">CounterMappingRegion::CodeRegion</a> &lt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><Highlight kind="normal">                            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493a185ca3ad8ff2f6fefd469d805a2657fc">CounterMappingRegion::ExpansionRegion</a> &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><Highlight kind="normal">                        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493a185ca3ad8ff2f6fefd469d805a2657fc">CounterMappingRegion::ExpansionRegion</a> &lt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><Highlight kind="normal">                            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493abbe924008d232ccec58896a8d143db42">CounterMappingRegion::SkippedRegion</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><Highlight kind="normal">                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected order of region kind values&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LHS.Kind &lt; RHS.Kind;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Combine counts of regions which cover the same area.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;CountedRegion&gt;</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><Highlight kind="normal">  combineRegions(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;CountedRegion&gt;</a> Regions) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Regions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#ac835b8735b1b2faec0efdca236e37d94">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1303"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Regions;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Active = Regions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#aae2bf8b46988a2fc0589e95903930c19">begin</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> End = Regions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#a9d959094f4544749c129c46034cbed67">end</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Regions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#aae2bf8b46988a2fc0589e95903930c19">begin</a>() + 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != End; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Active-&gt;startLoc() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;startLoc() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><Highlight kind="normal">          Active-&gt;endLoc() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;endLoc()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift to the next region.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><Highlight kind="normal">        ++Active;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Active != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#42;Active = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge duplicate region.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If CodeRegions and ExpansionRegions cover the same area, it&#39;s probably</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a macro which is fully expanded to another macro. In that case, we need</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to accumulate counts only from CodeRegions, or else the area will be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// counted twice.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// On the other hand, a macro may have a nested macro in its body. If the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// outer macro is used several times, the ExpansionRegion for the nested</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// macro will also be added several times. These ExpansionRegions cover</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the same source locations and have to be combined to reach the correct</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value for that area.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We add counts of the regions of the same kind as the active region</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to handle the both situations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Kind == Active-&gt;Kind)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><Highlight kind="normal">        Active-&gt;ExecutionCount += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;ExecutionCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Regions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#ad1acfeed5712da9a4ffafda05fac15ac">drop&#95;back</a>(std::distance(++Active, End));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++MinRegionCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StartOfSkippedRegion = !LineSegments.empty() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mapped</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
